node.display_long_description:
Rec Room - Join the Club!

Rec Room is THE place for you and your friends to build and play games together. Party up with Rec Roomers from all around the world to chat, hang out, explore millions of player-created rooms, or build something new and amazing to share with us all.
Rec Room is free, and cross plays on everything from phones to VR headsets. It’s the social app you play like a video game!

- Customize and dress up your cute Rec Room avatar to express your style
- Discover challenging, fun or straight up weird games made by creators just like you
- Try your skill with the Maker Pen, the tool used by Rec Room creators to build everything from puppies to helicopters to entire worlds!
- Join the best community - Rec Room is a fun and welcoming place for people from all walks of life! Let us help you find people you’ll LOVE to hang out with.

Come and join the club!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Rec Room PATCH - the "Rec Royale Update" edition

Happy new year! We wanted to ring in the new year with a small patch for you all:## General Improvements- There's a new share button on the room details screen of the watch menu. We're hoping this will drive more accurate numbers for statistics around sharing rooms, which we'll be sharing with creators soon!- We're happy to report torso and holsters are more stable when looking up or down.- VR: We've also made finger-pressing in the new UI more reliable, especially for quick presses.- Fixed a shader issue affecting certain avatar outfits.- Fixed a minor issue where other players wouldn't get notified when you invite them if you appear offline to them.- PC: Fixed an issue where the Desktop Sharing Speaker wouldn't switch input devices.As always, thanks for playing Rec Room!Please see here for convenient links to controls, tutorials, comfort options, etc.: https://recroom.com/communityWe love to hear your feedback, so please don't hesitate to let us know what you think...

node.reviewDescription:
Started my quest
Got online with the boys
Played some parkour
And shot cardboard decoys
Found a new game
Seemed like fun
Climbing a wall
But my friends had won
I climbed faster and faster
But to no avail
When it came to climbing 
I was destined to fail
As I tried again
I jumped to gain height
And it flew off of my head
My headset gained flight
It fell to the floor
And I heard a loud crack
When I finally saw it
My left strap had snapped
Tighten your headset
Don’t go through my pain
But other than that
You need this game

Let us help you find people you’ll LOVE to hang out with. Join the club!
